select COUNT(*) from t_teacher
where
t_no like '%{keyword}%'

select t_teacher.id,t_no, t_name, t_sex from t_teacher left join t_depart on t_teacher.t_depart_fk=t_depart.id left join t_student on t_student.s_depart_fk=t_depart.id left join t_clazz on t_student.s_clazz_fk=t_clazz.id where t_clazz.c_no=#{cNo}
select t_teacher.id,t_no, t_name, t_sex from t_teacher left join t_course on t_teacher.t_course_fk=t_course.id where t_course.co_no=#{coNo}
select t_teacher.id,t_no, t_name, t_sex from t_teacher left join t_depart on t_teacher.t_depart_fk=t_depart.id where t_depart.d_no=#{dNo}

select c_no, c_name from t_teacher left join t_depart on t_teacher.t_depart_fk=t_depart.id left join t_student on t_student.s_depart_fk=t_depart.id left join t_clazz on t_student.s_clazz_fk=t_clazz.id where t_teacher.t_no=#{tNo}
select co_no, co_name from t_teacher left join t_course on t_teacher.t_course_fk=t_course.id where t_teacher.t_no=#{tNo}
select d_no,d_name from t_teacher left join t_depart on t_teacher.t_depart_fk=t_depart.id where t_teacher.t_no=#{tNo}
